name: Andrélon Classic shampoo levendige kleur
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Macadamia Integrifolia/Tetraphylla Seed Oil (Macadamia-olie), Prunus Persica Kernel Oil (Perzikolie), Sodium Sulfate, Gluconolactone, Trehalose, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, CI 15510, CI 17200, CI 77891.
